page.title: 11INDUSTRY
page.content: INDUSTRY The two major industries of the area are the Aluminium Wire and Cable Co. and Ford Motor Company. Within the area, but not looked at by us are Baglan Bay Petro_Chemical Works and Llandarcy Oil Refinery. A.W.C.O. was set up in 1946 and during the next five years expanded rapidly. In 1950 capacity increased dur to the installation of a specially designed rod mill which produced high_quality hot rolled rod. This mill is one of the most efficient in the world. The Company's Head Offices at Port Tennant cover an area of 10 acres and are situated conveniently near the Docks and a railway siding.
